snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: Hotline Miami DLC
snippet.description:
Do you like hurting other people? You're not a very nice person are you.

Out 30 September for PAYDAY 2 - a collaboration between OVERKILL and Dennaton Games.

www.overkillsoftware.com/hotlinemiami/

More information here: http://steamcommunity.com/games/218620/announcements/detail/220996972064636082

Q: I recognize this theme...
A: This Hotline Miami DLC for PAYDAY 2 is a true collaboration between OVERKILL, creators of PAYDAY and Dennaton Games, creators of Hotline Miami. 

Q: Why?
A: Because we at OVERKILL fucking love Hotline Miami. 

Q: Never heard of Hotline Miami.
A: Buy Hotline Miami and support our friends at Dennaton Games. 

Q: When is DLC this released?
A: September 30th! 

Q: What does the DLC contain?
A: A heist is confirmed - you'll find out about the rest come end of September.
